stages.logText: Gabriel, the acolyte in Vilegard has asked me to investigate the sounds that only he is hearing.
Off of the Duleian road, just east of Vilegard, I noticed that the moaning sounds seem just a little bit louder.
Off of the Duleian road, just south of Alynndir's cabin, I noticed that the moaning sounds seem just a little bit louder.
I discovered the 'Haunted forest' and suspect that this may be the source of the sounds heard by Gabriel in Vilegard.
In the haunted house's basement, I discovered Benzimos (and he discovered me) while chanting some kind of ritual. He must be stopped.
Now that Benzimos is "dead" again, I should return to Vilegard and speak with Gabriel.
Gabriel was eternally grateful that I was able to prevent Benzimos' pack of undead from their potential attack on Vilegard.
